options.fig-cap: Sampling distribution for the proportion of 20 rolls of a die which result in a 1.  The distribution is based on repeating the sampling process 50000 times.

options.fig-cap: Sampling distribution for the proportion of 60 rolls of a die which result in a 1.  The distribution is based on repeating the sampling process 50000 times.
